title: Having trouble with downloading patches (FIX)
body:
Okay so I have had this problem for about 5 days now, I just built a new computer and it runs brilliantly but League of Legends (LoL) would crash when I tried to install the latest patches, I would get bugsplat errors, the client would turn white then crash, the updates would freeze and the game would crash shortly after.
I tried everything from re-installing the game to changing my region to even re-installing windows.
FINALLY I have found a fix. (You need another computer for this)
Un-install League of Legends (LoL) on your main computer and make sure the (Riot Games) folder is deleted from your computer.
If you have another computer with windows operating system on it, download League of Legends (LoL) on that computer and make sure the updates install.
Get an external hard drive or USB drive. (Must be at least 4 gigabytes to be sure it will fit the files)
Copy and paste the (Riot Games) folder from your second computer onto the external hard drive.
Copy and paste the (Riot Games) folder from the external hard drive onto your main computer's hard drive.
In the (Riot Games) folder there should be a folder named 'League of Legends'
Inside that folder their should be 3 folders and and 2 launchers.
Config
Logs
RADS
lol.launcher.admin
lol.launcher
Once you have moved the (Riot Games) folder onto your main computer, double click on lol.launcher.admin
The game should open and take you straight to the Launch screen for you to log in and play some League of Legends.
Now go kick some rift scuttlers or something. You're welcome!

If the problem persists, don't be shy to add me on League of Legends or to leave a comment on here and I will try my best to get back to you as soon as possible.
